## concatSeries() function

Same as [concat()](./promizr.concat.md)<!-- -->, but executes in series instead of parallel.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function concatSeries<T, U>(array: T[], iterator: AsyncListIterator<T, U[]>): Promise<U[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | T\[\] | The array to iterate on |
|  iterator | [AsyncListIterator](./promizr.asynclistiterator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, U\[\]&gt; | An iterator which returns arrays |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;U\[\]&gt;
